stripped_text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1 credit on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install non-connection cards. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, trash 1 of your installed cards.
text: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install non-connection cards. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, trash 1 of your installed cards.
title: Paladin Poemu
